name: com.atmoky.truespatial
description: Audio plug-ins and tools for True Spatial binaural audio rendering in Unity. This package contains native rendering plug-ins for spatialization of audio sources and rendering of Ambisonic sound beds - bringing True Spatial Audio to all platforms.

samples.description: A demo scene showcasing how to apply source directivity
A demo scene showcasing how to apply nearfield effects to audio sources
A demo scene containing many audio sources to showcase the performance of the trueSpatial plugin
A demo scene containing an Ambisonic sound bed to showcase the rendering of Ambisonic audio
A demo scene showcasing automatic computation and application of occlusion effects
